## CLIHandler interface
<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
interface CLIHandler 
```
## Methods

* [cli(argv)](./playground-client.clihandler.cli.md)Starts a PHP CLI session with given arguments.
Can only be used when PHP was compiled with the CLI SAPI.
Cannot be used in conjunction with `run()`<!-- -->.
